Cameron Diaz, Scarlett Johansson, Drew Barrymore and more break into epic fist fight for lockdown Boss B***h Challenge

MARVEL star Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, Margot Robbie, Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and more iconic actors have starred in one epic fist-fight challenge, shared on social media. The challenge sees them all film a scene individually that has then been edited together so that it looks like one extended fight scene. "I’m so bored! I just want to play with my friends!" says 41-year-old Zoe, kicking off the video as she reads a book. “Wait a minute, I can play with my friends!" she exclaims, as she walks towards the camera and punching it - with the edit switching to reveal Lucy, 52, who jumps back from the kick and calls out: "What the heck, Zozo?" Lucy then delivers a punch and the video continues on - although with child stars including Once Upon A Time In Hollywood's Julia Butters also appearing, there are moments where the stuntwomen choose to tickle or let a dog lick the girls, rather than punch a child in the face. Julia has no such qualms though, and quickly smashes her elbow toward the camera, while Little Women star Florence joins in the fun by picking up a wine bottle before smartly checking herself putting it down and picking up a dog toy to smash into the camera instead. Margot was clearly inspired by her DC Comics character Harley Quinn as she picks a baseball bat to aim towards the camera. Halle Berry, 53, meanwhile, falls into a swimming pool before recovering and delivering a punch worthy of any stuntwomen. Juliette Lewis, Hamilton star Renee Elise Goldberry and Rosario Dawson all also star, while Scottish singer KT Tunstall - whose song The Healer soundtracks the video - appears at the end and asks to be included next time.

I just want to play with my friends!” says Bell, who doubled for Uma Thurman in the “Kill Bill” movies. Tossing aside the book she was reading, she walks up to the camera and declares, “Wait a minute, I can play with my friends!” With that, she delivers a roundhouse kick aimed at the camera, with Lucy Lawless revealed as the recipient of the blow (Bell was also Lawless’ stunt double for “Xena: Warrior Princess”). “What the heck, Zo-zo?” asks a ticked-off Lawless as her facial expression shifts from surprise to glee, firing back with a punch assisted by her “Xena” Chakram. And then more female stars get in on the action. Through the magic of choreographed stunt fighting and clever editing, the end result is a who’s who of Hollywood’s female stars seemingly beating the tar out of each other in what Bell calls the #BossB***hFightChallenge. Other of the many, many stars involved include Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz, Scarlett Johansson, Margot Robbie, Halle Berry, Thandie Netwon and Florence Pugh, who punch, kick and headbutt each other, some gaining assistance fomr an array of props ranging from shovels to sheep. Coronation Street’s Peter Barlow will save Yasmeen from jail and expose Geoff’s lies say fans

CORRIE fans think Peter Barlow will save Yasmeen Nazir from prison after he notices she’s been showing some worrying behaviour. It’s been a rollercoaster week on the cobbles as viewers have been left horrified by the abuse Yasmeen has experienced at the hands of her husband Geoff Metcalfe. Fans watched from behind their cushions as Yasmeen finally snapped after months of terrifying abuse and stabbed Geoff in the neck with a broken wine bottle. In spoilers for the long-running soap, it’s been revealed Yasmeen, played by Shelley King, will call the police be charged with attempted murder as street residents are left in shock at the news of the attack. But fans think Peter, played by Chris Gascoyne, will come to her rescue and tell police he’s witnessed several displays of worrying behaviour from her. One wrote: “…If you look in the last few episodes we had Sally, Eileen and Peter notice something wasn’t right but didn’t act. Yasmeen was shocked that he'd handed over a fortune without consulting her, but Geoff barked: "You want to do this now? Get your coat. Shift. Don't you dare turn the waterworks on in here." As she walked away from the bar the cameras lingered on Peter looking at her with concern, giving fans hope that he will realise something isn't adding up after Yasmeen's arrest Away from prying eyes at No.6 viewers watched in horror as Geoff grabbed a knife and told Yasmeen: "Maybe I should kill you – do the world a favour. Would anyone really notice if you were gone?" With that, she picked up a wine bottle and smashed abusive Geoff around the head before plunging the broken glass into his neck. 2020-05-03 23:20:37 • The Sun • https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11540145/coronation-streets-peter-barlow-save-yasmeen-jail-expose-geoff/
Rating: 2.72
Spoilers: Corrie boss reveals all on Yasmeen and Geoff ending

There have been some difficult decisions to be made throughout the long running storyline arc of Geoff Metcalfe’s (Ian Bartholomew) campaign of coercive abuse against Yasmeen Nazir (Shelley King), according to Coronation Street boss Iain Macleod – but one thing he insists is that the recent twist that saw the horrific husband left for dead was planned for the start. Viewers saw Geoff become more aggressive than ever and leave Yasmeen in terror of her life as he ranted horrific abuse and waved a knife in her face, suggesting it would be better for everyone if he just killed her. In a relexive move to defend herself, a petrified Yasmeen stabbed Geoff in the neck and will be seen phoning the police to reveal that she has killed her husband. It has been a deliberately slow paced story – and one that producer Iain admits has been the most debated over in the storyline office out of any plot. He told Radio Times: ‘It’s been refined month by month in conjunction with our charity and research partners (including Women’s Aid). We’ve known pretty much from the start this incident would be one of the major peaks. ‘It’s been organically told and we’ve agonised over the advancement of how Geoff’s behaviour evolved. ‘It has been discussed in more detail than any other story I’ve worked on, just to make sure we get the nuance right.’ The storyline has come up for almost universal praise, with many in Yasmeen’s position having commended the show for its accurate portrayal of coercive control. Iain added: ‘We don’t make it for this reason but it is important to have what I call good ‘drama karma’: what you’re putting on screen is karmically making the world little bit of a better place. I really think this story is.’ If you’ve got a soap or TV story, video or pictures get in touch by emailing us soaps@metro.co.uk – we’d love to hear from you. Join the community by leaving a comment below and stay updated on all things soaps at our homepage.

Joe Thornton reveals he shaved his signature beard with help from daughter

2020-05-03 18:14:06 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.28
Importance: 1.28
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 18:14:06

Joe Thornton reveals he shaved his signature beard with help from daughter

At a time when facial hair is growing unabashedly across a shut-down country, one of hockey’s most well-known beards has disappeared. Sharks center Joe Thornton chopped off his beard for the first time in nearly two years, the team revealed in a video, which showed the before and after, with some help from his daughter, Ayla, who channeled “I Dream of Jeannie” to show the stunning change. The 40-year-old Thornton started growing his graybeard during the 2015-16 season as he and Sharks defenseman Brent Burns became known for their matching looks, which they dubbed “lifestyle beards.” There was one slight interruption, when Burns shaved Thornton’s beard at a team party just before the 2018 season, but Thornton had spent every day since then growing it back. “I regretted [shaving] as soon as it started hitting the floor,” Thornton told reporters in 2018. “Hopefully it’ll grow back quickly.” Thornton’s son was not a fan of him clean-shaven at the time. “My 5-year-old wasn’t happy this morning when he woke up,” Thornton said. “He didn’t want to see dad, so I’ve got to make it up to him.” With the NHL’s season on pause because of the coronavirus pandemic, Thornton has some time to start growing his beard back in. He won’t need to worry about growing one for the playoffs, though — if there are playoffs — as the Sharks were in last place in the Western Conference at the time the season was suspended.

2020-05-03 18:14:06 • New York Post • https://nypost.com/2020/05/03/joe-thornton-reveals-he-shaved-his-beard-with-help-from-daughter/?utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_source=NYPTwitter&utm_medium=SocialFlow
Rating: 2.55
Joe Thornton reveals he has shaved his iconic beard

There are a select few NHL players who you can pick out the moment they step on the ice. San Jose Sharks forward Joe Thornton is probably on top of that list, althoughthat might not be the case anymore. The veteran center revealed in a video Saturday that he had shaved his iconic shaggy facial hair. It marks the first time he has been clean-shaven since the start of the 2018-19 season, when Sharks teammate Brent Burns did the honor of shaving Thornton's beard for him. The video featured an initially bearded Thornton standing next to his daughter, Ayla. A few seconds in, she nods her head and it snaps to a now-beardless Thornton standing in the same place. Thornton started growing out his facial hair during the 2015-16 season. His beard gained notoriety during the Sharks' run to the Stanley Cup Final that year when St. Louis Blues forward David Backes grabbed it during a squabble. The beard was also damaged in early 2018 when Nazem Kadri of the Toronto Maple Leafspulled out a tuft of it during a fight. While many people are choosing to grow out their facial hair during theircoronavirus quarantine, it seems Thornton has opted for the oppositeapproach. Hopefully, hockey returns before his beard has grown back too much.

Sexy singer, Ednaco releases “Carry on” video amid COVID-19 lockdown

Kindly Share This Story: Sultry actress and musician, Edith Nelo Okafor, popularly known as Ednaco has defied all odds to release the video of her trending song “Carry on” amid the Coronavirus pandemic. According to her, it was a deliberate move to contribute her own quota to alleviate the gloom of the lockdown by bringing message of hope and love. “It’s a motivational song I recorded in 2019. I felt this is the right time to drop it online due to what the world is facing today. The song is a reminder for people to keep pushing and hoping that things would get better because there’s no darkness without light and that applies to all of us and to life itself. A lot of people have given up on all their dreams and ambitions, they stop bothering to make efforts. They stop trying. Yes, we all know that life is and can be hard, making choices and choosing a path is hard, things can be gone in a heartbeat, setbacks occur, failure arises and losses happen, but we need to keep pushing and striving because at the end of the tunnel there is light. No matter what you are going through, there is light at the end of the tunnel,” she said in a chat with Showtime Bonus. READ ALSO: COVID-19: Why you can’t lift lockdown in Nigeria now, CUPP tells FG Ednaco revealed that she started singing in church at the age of six but took it seriously and went professional in 2016. She started as a duo with her brother and they were called Funstarz. They did a couple of songs and performed at shows together until the brother had to go for the National Youth Service Corps. That broke up the act and broke her heart too. But the passion picked her up again, seeing her releasing her first official single in 2019 titled “Freaky” and the rest, as they say, is history. “I chose music as a career because is my passion. I cannot escape it. It is a part of who I am. It has strengthened my understanding of people and their emotions. And I have come to realize that music is my calling in life and it must be nurtured correctly to be able to grow and change the world. “Music has always been able to comfort and calm me in times of trouble, I would consider music to be more than passion. it’s more like a never-failing friend,” she declared. Well, the widely venerated man of God, Prophet Jeremiah Fufeyin, is one of such vessels. The billionaire prophet, 49-year-old Jeremiah Omoto Fufeyin, who is also the founder and head prophet of Christ Mercyland Deliverance Ministry, has been quite popular in the news and on social media, most recently, for a shocking time-based prophecy, about the COVID-19 pandemic, that has found fruition. On March 21st, the billionaire prophet prophesied that the deadly Coronavirus COVID-19 would meet its end in a month and a week (about 37 days), across the world. He predicted that the virus would gradually disappear across countries, just as it had spread gradually across countries, saying that it would leave ‘batch by batch’. He also stressed that in the stated time, the viral disease would start to go down gradually, with nations recording victories and easing their preventive measures. Note that this prophecy came a full week before Nigerians were addressed by the presidency and over a week before lockdown measures were enacted in Nigeria. Healing scriptures everyone must know - Top 20 It is indeed a wonder to watch a prophecy unfold. Global Coronavirus pandemic disappearing as prophesied, Prophet Fufeyin declares

Kindly Share This Story: A Billionaire Prophet, who is the Founder and Head Prophet of Christ Mercyland Deliverance Ministry Jeremiah Fufeyin, yesterday said the journey to freedom from the global  outbreak of Corona Virus pandemic has started as the virus is disappearing globally exactly as he earlier prophesied. Fufeyin, a philanthropist, who has donated millions of naira to the Federal Government, members of his church and the general public to assuage the pain caused by the pandemic stated that he had foreseen the current reopening of economies across the world, insisting that the virus would disappear from country to country as it came. In a sermon and prophesies released earlier in March, Fufeyin had specifically stated that from  end of March till 28th April 2020, the virus would be seen to be gradually disappearing from one nation to another the same way it came as a result of his prayers of mercy and that of believers from around the world. He stated clearly that between that day and a month and one week later the virus would be seen to be disappearing from the face of the earth in the same manner it started from one country to another while economies would gradually open up. In a release made available to journalists yesterday by the church, the clergy linked the current easing of lockdown across continents and indeed Africa to the vision he had received from God, raising the hope of freedom for people across the world. Recall that in Germany, South Africa, Nigeria, China, U.S, Kenya and most countries of the world, governments have announced easing of lockdown as well as a number of cure for the pandemic, which had ravaged the world since late last year. The 49 year old Billionaire Prophet, described in the release as God’s extraordinary vessels for this generation noted that the viral disease would start to go down gradually, with nations recording victories and easing their preventive measures. Talking specifically about Nigeria, the release said: “Note that this prophecy came a full week before Nigerians were addressed by the Presidency, and over a week before lockdown measures were enacted in Nigeria. Drawing up a timeline of victories recorded across world, the church noted on April 21, 2020, Swiss authorities announced plans to ease their lockdown measures after recording positive success in managing the pandemic. “On April 21, 2020, a West African country, Mauritiana, was declared COVID-19 free, after recording 6 recoveries and one death. “April 21,2020, Italy, one of the worst hit countries, recorded its lowest number of deaths, since March 19, 2020, and a fall in active cases. “On April 22, 2020, activities resumed in Hamburg- Germany after a long term lockdown. Return to school had also been announced, and trade is back in full swing. There was jubilation on the streets of Dubai as authorities eased almost 2 months lockdown measures, after recording zero COVID- 19 cases in some areas. “Madagascar launched Africa’s first preventive treatment, and effective cure for the COVID-19 disease, “COVID ORGANICS”, and even made it compulsory for school children returning to schools. “On April 27, 2020, President Muhammadu Buhari announced the imminent easing of strict lockdown restrictions in most states in Nigeria,” the release stated. Gorillaz share new song ft. Tony Allen & Skepta

2020-05-02 14:51:00 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.22
Importance: 1.22
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 03:54:26

Gorillaz share new song ft. Tony Allen & Skepta

Afrobeat legend Tony Allen sadly passed away earlier this week at age 79, and as a tribute to him, Damon Albarn (who Tony played with in The Good The Bad and The Queen) released a song that he and Allen recorded with Skepta shortly before quarantine began. As Pitchfork points out, a press release states, “The track was written and recorded with Skepta in London just before lockdown and is being shared immediately as a tribute to the spirit of a great man, Tony Allen.” Listen:

2020-05-02 14:51:00 • BrooklynVegan • http://www.brooklynvegan.com/gorillaz-share-new-song-ft-tony-allen-skepta/
Rating: 0.30
I want to give something magical to music lovers – Playboycasted

Kindly Share This Story: Nigerian singer, songwriter and music enthusiast, Ogundayomi Olawale, famously known as Playboycasted, does not only make music for fame or money but to keep the world a better and safer place for everybody. For somebody whose music career started at the age of 9 as a church chorister, Playboycasted knew what he wanted to make out of life and has remained truthful to himself and craft over the years. Speaking in an interview during the week, Playboycasted who loves to rap recalled how he released his first rap single: “Shemi” among other freestyles as back as 2013. He would later bag four awards as a rapper at the SLIC Campus recognition awards, held yearly at the Gateway ICT Polytechnic, where he obtained Ordinary National Diploma (OND) in Mass Communication. He showed the world a glimpse of what to expect when in 2017, he released series of singles including his official single “Mapamilekun”, a song widely regarded as one in a lifetime inspirational hit. This was followed by a street anthem, “Rollercoaster” and another collaboration with former YBNL star Lyta, in the song entitled “Success”. With a newly released EP, “Top Boy”, the singer hinted that there was more to come from him as he continues to push his music career to a new level and showing many music lovers what they may have been missing. Laced with Afro-fusion sounds that appreciate the beauty and uniqueness of African ladies across the continent, the EP has songs like No Yawa, Person, Oremi Ti, Governor, Be There, Shayo, Holla and Enough as the singer attempted to create something unique in his own way. “I want to give something magical to every music lover and I also want to remind my audience that there is life beyond the current situation they may be grappling with. This is a piece of music and body of work for everybody.” VANGUARD Kindly Share This Story:

BGT unseen clip sees 10-year-old wow judges with Chuck Berry's Johnny Be Good

A 10-year-old guitarist wowed the judges on Britain’s Got Talent with Chuck Berry’s classic Johnny Be Good. In an unseen clip from the ITV talent show, we meet little rock star, Joseph Sheppard who had the crowd eating out the palm of his hand. Before his audition, Simon Cowell complimented his hair while Amanda Holden commented on his ‘great style’. Donning a leather jacket and his guitar Joseph asked the audience: ‘Are you ready to rock Manchester?’ And it’s safe to say no one expected him to perform the way he did. Joseph got fantastic feedback from the judges after his audition as Simon said: ‘Let’s go to the rock expert on the panel, David.’ ‘You are so cool, such a little dude and you’re very very skilled I mean that is not easy to sing and play the guitar like that,’ David Walliams commented. ‘I think you’re going to be a huge star well done.’ Alesha Dixon added: ‘I was so impressed, your stage performance was fantastic, the way you owned it in front of all these people.’ While Amanda continued: ‘You are the complete package here, that was a brill audition.’ And of course, Simon Cowell had the last word as he said: ‘Very good Joseph that was a great audition, going forward in five years time where do you see yourself?’ Joseph simply replied: ‘Hopefully quite famous.’ Other acts that wowed the judges on Saturday night’s instalment were 96-year-old Nora and a group of dancing turtles. And not forgetting Amanda Holden’s golden buzzer act, which was Honey and Sammy, a mother a daughter act from Essex. Britain’s Got Talent returns on Saturday at 8pm on ITV. Got a story? Britain's Got Talent viewers are in for a treat with a dazzling dance performance from Ezekiel and Carl on tonight's show. The Filipino dance partners stunned judges Simon Cowell, Amanda Holden, David Walliams and Alesha Dixon with their high-energy ballroom performance. In a teaser of the BGT action, the duo donned an incredible feather-laced ball gown and a sequin suit as they spoke to the excited crowd. "So what made you want to perform on Britain's Got Talent?"  Amanda asked the dancers. "We really want to perform in front of the British royal family," they explained. Kicking off their dance routine to Tina Turner's Proud Mary, both Ezekiel and Carl stripped off layers of their outfits before heading into their big exciting reveal. As the music tempo picks up speed, one of the dancers heads into a mind-bending amount of twirls across the stage. His purple number dramatically changes into the rainbow pride flag colours as they pull out all the stops for their dancing. The crowd erupts with applause over the heart-warming and positive performance as the judges clap along to the recognisable tune. Ezekiel and Carl have not the only impressive dance couple to grace the stage during this year's show. Last week, the judges were stunned by Birmingham-based contemporary dance performers Chantelle, 12, and Billy, 14. When quizzed by the judges about what they would do with the prize money, Chantelle explained: "Well I would bring home my family from the Philippines because they've never seen me dance before." The young duo received a standing ovation for their stunning dance choreography. Meghan Markle Is Reportedly Preparing To Relaunch A Lifestyle Blog

2020-05-04 00:54:36 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.20
Importance: 1.20
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 17:50:49

Meghan Markle Is Reportedly Preparing To Relaunch A Lifestyle Blog

May 3, 2020 Anna Harnes Royal insiders are claiming that Meghan Markle is about to launch a new lifestyle website as part of her life as living as a non-royal. The royal gossip come as the Sussexes have begun their life outside of the royal family after formally leaving on March 31. The two have since moved to Los Angeles with their son, Archie. According to Page Six, royal expert Myka Meier claimed that she believed that the duchess was soon goinging to revamp her online and social media presence. “I think Meghan is going to have another Instagram,” Meier said on the Royally Obsessed podcast last week. “I think she’s going to do a Goop, like a new version of The Tig … I really think that’s coming.” The Tig was Markle’s lifestye blog that she ran for close to three years. The website covered things like food, fashion, and travel. However, Markle decided to end her work on the blog in April 2017, and was seen as one of the surest signs that her relationship with Prince Harry was about to progress into an engagement. Meier added that she had spoken to a close friend of the duchess who not only confirmed the claims about a new lifestyle blog, but also suggested that Markle had already started working on her project. “I have a friend with a little bit of insider knowledge, and I think she’s already working on something,” Meier claimed. “I think we will be seeing something very interesting and creative with masterminds from all over the world coming together to bring something inspiring soon,” she finished. Though Markle technically closed down The Tig, royal fans have noted that she still maintains the domain name and that it is likely the blog could be revived. Currently, the url directs to a page where the duchess wrote a goodbye note to her fans. Moreover, her passion for the blog was evident in her farewell note on the website. “What began as a passion project (my little engine that could) evolved into an amazing community of inspiration, support, fun and frivolity,” she wrote before thanking her fans for “everything.” The duchess has recently been in the news after pledging to continue her lawsuit against The Mail On Sunday. As was previously reported by The Inquisitr, Markle is currently suing the paper for publishing parts of a “private and confidential” letter she sent to her father shortly after her wedding to Prince Harry. However, the most recent ruling did not fall in her favor, and the presiding judge in her case struck out a number of her arguments.

Meghan Markle 'to bring back lifestyle blog' to rival Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop

Meghan Markle has got some big plans now she's stepped down as a senior royal and living her old showbiz life in LA, it's claimed. The Duchess of Sussex, 38, is said to be bringing back her successful lifestyle blog The Tig in a bid to be the next Gwyneth Paltrow, who runs the similar website Goop. Meghan shut her blog down in 2017 a year after she started dating Prince Harry, though it's still live with her goodbye message to her followers. Royal expert Myka Meier has suggested the former Suits actress is working on bringing back a version of The Tig, which covered food, travel, fashion and beauty. "I think Meghan is going to have another Instagram," Myka told podcast Royally Obsessed last week. "I think she’s going to do a goop, like a new version of The Tig. "I really think that’s coming." Meg could follow in Gwyn's footsteps after the huge success of Goop, which has a similar theme. Myka added: "I'm pretty sure there's a goopish thing coming soon, for a few different reasons. "I have a friend with a little bit of insider knowledge and I think she’s already working on something. "I think we will be seeing something very interesting and creative with masterminds from all over the world coming together to bring something inspiring soon." Since stepping down as a senior royal Meghan has already narrated Disney Plus documentary Elephants. Meanwhile, Prince Harry will be introducing the 75th-anniversary episode of Thomas the Tank Engine.

Kylie's latest jaw dropping snaps come just days after fans accused her of photoshopping some of her images. May 1, 2020 Sarah Batool Haider Canadian model Khloe Terae recently took to her Instagram page and wowed her 2.3 million fans with a very hot post. That’s not all, but the racy ensemble also enabled her to put her sexy legs on full display. A pair of sparkly gray wings were also added to her attire with the help of a photo-editing tool. In keeping with her glamorous attire, Khloe sported a full face of makeup. The application included a dewy foundation that gave her skin a flawless finish. She dusted her cheeks with a pink blush, opted for a nude lipstick, nude eyeshadow, heavily lined eyes, and a thick coat of mascara. Khloe finished off her makeup application with well-defined, dark eyebrows and nose contouring. She also had her perfectly-manicured nails painted with a nude polish. She wore her blond tresses in romantic waves and allowed them to cascade over her shoulders. In terms of jewelry, she opted for a pair of sparkly stud earrings, multiple rings, and two sparkly bracelets, one in each wrist. To strike a pose, she sat next to a wall and rested her arm against it. She tilted her head, sported a pout, and gazed at the camera. In the caption, Khloe wrote that May is her favorite month because she was born in the same month. She also tagged her makeup artist Andrew Saint Andrew, photographer Brian B Hayes, and the photo-editing service Edit Collagee for acknowledgment. Within five hours of going live, the snap garnered more than 7,600 likes. Casualty episode scrapped by BBC over Covid-19 - but fans want missing episode

2020-05-03 19:06:18 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.20
Importance: 1.20
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-03 19:06:18

Casualty episode scrapped by BBC over Covid-19 - but fans want missing episode

Fans of medical drama Casualty want a missing episode made available on BBC iPlayer. The episode was due to be shown this weekend but was scrapped by the BBC due to 'inappropriate' content during the current coronavirus pandemic. An announcement before last night's instalment said: "The episode we were due to watch tonight, filmed before the spread of Covid-19, was considered inappropriate to show at the moment." The episode that aired on Saturday night instead included a short catch-up that filled viewers in on scenes from the major storylines that they will have missed due to the transmission of the preceding instalment being skipped. The announcer continued before it started: "But never fear. everything we need to know from that episode is in a catch up right at the start of the programme." However, the short recap before this weekend's episode wasn't enough for some fans, who have now taken to social media calling for the BBC to make the missing instalment available on their catch-up service, BBC iPlayer. One fan wrote on Twitter : "I assumed I’d missed one so checked iPlayer but no. Turns out the BBC decided to cut it! "Please put it on iPlayer so I can decide whether to watch it!!" Another disappointed viewer commented: "Can't they just put it on iplayer then? Gives people a choice on whether they want to watch or not! #casualty " Elsewhere, a third Casualty fan commented: "That missing episode of #Casualty looks great. Bonkers decision not to show it. "I understand the reasoning but I disagree with it." Another Twitter user thought the missing episode could have helped give some viewers a realistic look at what we're all currently facing. They tweeted: "Deemed inappropriate? Maybe show the episode and give people the reality check they need to keep them in the bloody house #casualty." Finally, one Casualty viewer concluded: "Hope they put the missing episode on iPlayer. "I get they didn't want to show it and the white suits on the preview suggest a virus situation but I still wanna watch it! We've missed a massive Marty storyline! #Casualty " Regardless of whether the BBC do eventually make the episode available to fans, Casualty will now be on a break until May 23 when it will return with its next episode. Casualty returns to BBC One later this month. What did you think of this weekend's Casualty episode? Let us know in the comments below.

Casualty fans confused as BBC skips an 'inappropriate episode'

Casualty viewers were confused last night when the BBC skipped an episode it called "inappropriate". Fans had been expecting to watch a gripping episode culminating with a showdown between Ethan and Will - but instead it was replaced by a catch-up and the following week's episode. The extended preview at the start was designed to fill in the gaps on what fans would've seen in the axed episode. A voiceover announcer said: "The episode we were due to watch tonight, filmed before the spread of COVID-19, was considered inappropriate to show at the moment. "But never fear, everything we need to know from that episode is in a catch-up right at the start of the programme." Read more: EastEnders viewers want Nancy Carter to return as Casualty confirms actress Maddy Hill's exit However glimpses of the episode from the preview showed characters dressed in full protective gear, suggesting an epidemic style storyline. Such a plot would too closely mirror real life events with the current pandemic. But that didn't stop fans being confused about what was going on. And they were still desperate to see the missing episode. One said: "Really, really disappointed at the missing episode of #Casualty, especially when it’s so pivotal to current storylines. Speaking at an Edinburgh TV Festival online Q&A, he said: "We do have to abide by the rules and while social distancing is in place it is going to be difficult. Read more: EastEnders, Casualty and Holby City are 'not quite' ready to resume production "There are ways of cheating, actors being close enough together to interact in a scene." He added: "We’re not quite at that point yet. "But all of those conversation are being had and there is a real determination to get that show back up and running." 12 Movie Stars You Probably Forgot Appeared on “Sex and the City”

2020-05-02 04:30:00 • 2 articles
Weight: 1.17
Importance: 1.17
Age penalty: 1.00
Best date: 2020-05-02 04:30:00

12 Movie Stars You Probably Forgot Appeared on “Sex and the City”

The adventures of Carrie Bradshaw and her 3 best friends first premiered on our screens in 1998. Sex and the City quickly found success and featured numerous guest stars, some of which were only starting on their path in Hollywood. Bright Side looked back at the iconic show and discovered many celebrities we had no idea were on it. We invite you to take a stroll down memory lane with us and perhaps you’ll find a few surprises in the mix. Appeared in: season 2, episode 4 Cooper played Jake, Carrie Bradshaw’s love interest after a failed photo-shoot brought her self-esteem way down. Appeared in: season 2, episode 15 Theroux perfectly embodied the awkward writer, Vaughn, who went out with Carrie several times. And all could’ve ended well if she hadn’t hit it off better with his mother than with him. Appeared in: season 3, episode 2 In an if-you-blink-too-fast-you’ll-miss-it moment, Elizabeth played a helpful party guest who gave a distressed Charlotte some much-needed dating advice. Appeared in: season 3, episode 14 The charismatic Vaughn was lucky enough to be Carrie’s fun fling while in LA, but she quickly discovered he was actually a wolf in sheep’s clothing. Appeared in: season 3, episode 15 Dennings portrayed a 13-year-old socialite who made Samantha run around New York trying to throw her a perfect birthday party. Appeared in: season 1, episode 4 In season 1, Carrie was still torn between dating older men and having fun with twenty-something-year-old guys. Olyphant’s character helped her say goodbye to younger men once and for all. Appeared in: season 3, episode 13 Gellar made a noticeable cameo when she played Carrie’s loud agent Debbie who tried to get her to sign a movie deal based on her life. Appeared in: season 6, episode 10 Duchovny appeared as Carrie’s high school boyfriend she kept having second thoughts about. Their reunion brought back old feelings and new discoveries. Appeared in: season 4, episode 2 Klum played herself as she strutted down the runway alongside Carrie in an empowering fashion show. Appeared in: season 4, episode 11 Liu also made a cameo as an exaggerated version of herself who contemplated hiring Samantha as her main PR person. Appeared in: season 6, episode 3 Coolidge gave our 4 main ladies a hard time when she invited them to her party that turned out to be an excuse to sell her unusual purses. Appeared in: season 3, episode 13 McConaughey had a lot of fun playing a version of himself who wanted to become Mr. Big in a movie adaptation of Carrie’s life. When was the last time you revisited the show? Do you remember any of these stars who made brief appearances? Preview photo credit Sex and the City / HBO, Invision/Invision/East News

2020-05-02 04:30:00 • BrightSide — Inspiration. Creativity. Wonder. • https://brightside.me/wonder-films/12-movie-stars-you-probably-forgot-appeared-on-sex-and-the-city-796953/
Rating: 2.32
Who knew Hollyoaks' Nancy Osbourne was in The Worst Witch?

The Worst Witch is dropping on BritBox next week, ready to give us a dose of nostalgia during lockdown. The ITV series aired back in 1998, and followed a group of young witches who attended Miss Cackle’s school for magic.  Basically Harry Potter in TV show form. We were so keen to have the OG magic crew on our screens once more that we delved into old episodes – and noticed a very famous face walking around the halls. Who knew, years before Nancy popped up in Hollyoaks, she was causing chaos in a witch academy? Actress Jessica Fox starred as Mildred Hubble’s (Georgina Sherrington) best pal Enid Nightshade, who played all kinds of practical jokes on the gang in the hopes of fitting in. Basically, she was the fun one of the group. Chatting to Metro.co.uk, Jessica recalled some of her favourite moments from the show – which aired until 2001. ‘It was a really, really fun thing to film. We had such a good time doing it,’ she told us. ‘There was always something mad happening. ‘I loved it when anything got blown up, I found that really exciting. Enid was very naughty, she was always getting into trouble and doing naughty things. ‘I think she blew something up, or she signed off-key on purpose and smashed bottles. And I just remember they had little explosives, and they were made out of a special glass that shatters if you just touch it. ‘Everything was just exploding around me, I remember thinking that was really, really cool.’ It sounds like her time on set for the Worst Witch really set Jessica up well for Hollyoaks – especially with everything blowing up around her. And, as the 36-year-old faces a major milestone in Chester, she’s thrilled to have another career high to look back on with the ITV series appearing on BritBox. ‘It’s actually really nice,’ she continued. ‘Obviously I’m on Hollyoaks and it will be 15 years this year, it feels like there’s lots of looking back for me at the moment, because there’s quite a lot of milestones happening. ‘It’s nice to revisit and remember all the things that you’ve done.  ‘I was really lucky I started working when I was really little, about seven or eight. It’s nice to look at your back catalogue, and think, “Gosh, didn’t I do a lot?”.’ ‘I know that from when people speak to me, their eyes always light up and they go, “I loved the Worst Witch!”,’ she added. ‘It’ll be really nice to hear that again, really. It’s always nice to be told that the programmes you were in were loved.’ The Worst Witch is available on BritBox from 7th May. Visit www.britbox.co.uk to sign up for a 30 day free trial. Got a story? If you’ve got a celebrity story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page – we’d love to hear from you.

2020-05-02 11:00:34 • Metro • https://metro.co.uk/2020/05/02/hollyoaks-nancy-osbourne-jessica-fox-worst-witch-itv-britbox-12641920/
Rating: 2.18
